title: Canada slaps 100% tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles
description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau introduced significant tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles and steel and aluminum products to counter state-subsidized imports. The measures include a 100 percent tariff on EVs starting October 1 and a 25 percent surtax on steel and aluminum from October 15, aiming to foster fair trade practices and protect Canadaâ€™s green transition.
